subtasks: Walk through the cotton farm to inspect crop progress
Identify the variety of cotton (Lipro, 3 acres)
Note the readiness of the first crop and buds for the second crop
Assess the need for rainfall for optimal growth
Observe cotton plant height and growth stage

tasks.task: Managing crops and walking around the farm
subtasks: Check for signs of insects or pests
Ensure safe passage around the farm, avoiding obstacles like camels
Manage waste areas and pathways on the farm
Consider organic farming practices, noting the absence of pesticides
Identify and locate custard apple trees on the farm
Discard or store harvested custard apples
